SELECT NVL(MAX(project_id), 0) + 1 FROM project
INSERT INTO project ( project_id, project_name, project_access, manager_accp, write_access, update_access, board_access, comment_access, file_access, dept_id )
VALUES ( #{projectId}, #{projectName}, #{projectAccess}, #{managerAccp}, #{writeAccess}, #{updateAccess}, #{boardAccess}, #{commentAccess}, #{fileAccess}, #{deptId} )
mapper.select: SELECT project_id, project_name, project_access, manager_accp, write_access, update_access, board_access, comment_access, file_access, dept_id FROM project WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.update: UPDATE project SET project_name = #{projectName}, project_access = #{projectAccess}, manager_accp = #{managerAccp}, write_access = #{writeAccess}, update_access = #{updateAccess}, board_access = #{boardAccess}, comment_access = #{commentAccess}, file_access = #{fileAccess}, dept_id = #{deptId} WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.select: SELECT p.project_id, p.project_name, find_subcode(p.project_access) AS project_access, find_subcode(p.manager_accp) AS manager_accp, find_subcode(p.write_access) AS write_access, find_subcode(p.update_access) AS update_access, find_subcode(p.board_access) AS board_access, find_subcode(p.file_access) AS file_access, find_subcode(p.comment_access) AS comment_access, prj_particir_num, project_markup, p.dept_id, p.project_cls FROM project p JOIN ( SELECT project_id, member_id, COUNT(*) AS prj_particir_num, MAX(project_markup) AS project_markup FROM prj_particir GROUP BY project_id, member_id ) pp ON (p.project_id = pp.project_id AND pp.member_id=#{memberId}) WHERE pp.member_id=#{memberId}

SELECT DISTINCT p.project_id, p.project_name, find_subcode(p.project_access) AS project_access, find_subcode(p.manager_accp) AS manager_accp, find_subcode(p.write_access) AS write_access, find_subcode(p.update_access) AS update_access, find_subcode(p.board_access) AS board_access, find_subcode(p.file_access) AS file_access, find_subcode(p.comment_access) AS comment_access, (SELECT COUNT(*) from prj_particir pp WHERE p.project_id=pp.project_id) AS prj_particir_num, p.dept_id, p.project_cls FROM project p WHERE BOARD_ACCESS='J1' AND dept_id IN (SELECT dept_id FROM department WHERE company_id= #{companyId})
